name: Wedding Planning
detailed_description: Our wedding planning service covers everything from venue selection to coordinating every detail of your special day. We'll work closely with you to ensure your dream wedding becomes a reality.

name: Venue Selection
short_description: Expert assistance in choosing the perfect venue
detailed_description: Finding the right wedding venue is crucial. We'll help you select a venue that suits your style and budget, ensuring that it's the perfect backdrop for your special day.

name: Catering Services
short_description: Exquisite catering options for memorable dining
detailed_description: Our catering services offer a range of delectable options to delight your guests. We provide customized menus and a memorable dining experience that will leave a lasting impression.

name: Photography and Videography
detailed_description: Capture every moment of your special day with our professional photography and videography services. Our experienced team will ensure that your memories are preserved beautifully.

name: Floral and Decor
detailed_description: Transform your wedding venue into a magical space with our floral and decor services. We offer exquisite floral arrangements and decorative elements that will create a captivating ambiance.

name: Entertainment Services
short_description: Entertainment options to keep guests engaged
detailed_description: Ensure your guests have a great time with our entertainment services. We offer live music, DJs, and other entertainment options to create an enjoyable atmosphere at your wedding.
